name: mewnium-z--held
effect: Held: Allows mew to upgrade psychic into genesis supernova.
short_effect: Held: Allows Mew to upgrade Psychic into Genesis Supernova.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Mew’s Psychic to a Z-Move.
